name: Transfer Wix form submissions to KlickTipp
description:
Automatically sync new Wix form submissions to KlickTipp and keep your contact list up to date â€” no manual work needed. Each time someone fills out a form on your Wix site, their details such as name, email, phone, birthday, company, and address are instantly added or updated in KlickTipp.

Perfect for businesses and marketers who want to capture leads in real time and trigger personalized campaigns right away. You can also assign tags based on form type or submission source, enabling targeted automations and smarter audience segmentation.

With this seamless connection, your contacts stay organized, your data remains current, and every submission becomes an opportunity for engagement.
